content: miffy head amigurumi miffy head amigurumi made by purpje miffy head amigurumi supplies & tools main white - jumbo weight 110g yarn eyes/mouth black - fingering weight 1g hook 6 5mm eyes 2 75mm fibrefill 50g abbreviations chain chain decrease decrease fo finish off chain 1 cut yarn weave in ends increase increase single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch * a * × b repeat a for a number of b times 𝑥 work all of 𝑥 in one stitch notes gauge & size 5 stitches × 5 row of single crochets in 5cm l 17 × b 10 × h 20 5 cm notes for assistance bypurpje@outlook com you may sell any item made from any free or purchased pattern however you are not allowed to resell distribute duplicate or share these patterns or downloads in any printed or digital form in full or to claim patterns as your own original designs made by purpje miffy head amigurumi pattern ● chain 1 to begin & slip_stitch to end each round head × 2 1 chain 7 from 2nd chain from hook increase 4 single_crochet 4 single_crochet 4 single_crochet increase 16 2 *single_crochet increase* × 8 24 3 *single_crochet increase* × 12 36 4 *single_crochet increase single_crochet* × 12 48 5 single_crochet in each stitch 48 6 *3 single_crochet increase* × 12 60 fold in half mark the 6th from each end there should be 18 stitches between the markers joining ● place 2 pieces right side facing stitch markers aligned ● begin from the left pair of markers ● work only in the outer loops further from each other ● single_crochet to the other pair of markers 42 turn work inside out and stuff ear × 2 ● mark the 9th stitch from the left of the opening mark the same on the other side ● begin from the first marker for reference this side will be the face and the other the back 9 single_crochet on face 1 single_crochet on side connecting round 19 9 single_crochet on back 2 9 single_crochet decrease 8 single_crochet 18 3-4 single_crochet in each stitch 18 5 *single_crochet decrease* × 6 start stuffing 12 6 6 decrease stuff before closing 6 fo repeat the same for the 2nd ear begin with a long tail to stitch up the gap between the ears after eye × 2 ● chain 4 increase single_crochet 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet 8 ● finish with invisible slip_stitch sew onto r2 8 stitches apart finishing ● embroider mouth on r2 between the eyes ● close up gap between ears stuff more if needed made by purpje miffy head amigurumi made by purpje
